nodes.name: repayBehalf

repayBehalf(address).details: The provided Ether is applied towards the borrow balance, any excess is refunded

params.borrower: The address of the borrower account to repay on behalf of

repayBehalfExplicit(address,address).details: The provided Ether is applied towards the borrow balance, any excess is refunded

params.borrower: The address of the borrower account to repay on behalf of
params.cEther_: The address of the cEther contract to repay in
